channel.title: rtfm on Fumbles and stumbles with StatusHat
channel.description: Recent content in rtfm on Fumbles and stumbles with StatusHat

item.title: Another day another fumble
item.description: Last time I had a short TODO-list at the end of my post. How many have I managed to tick off?

item.title: Theme upgrade (more of a repair, really)
item.description: Time to start doing things properly. Or try to, at least. I followed the guide more closely this time, and did things a tiny bit more slowly. Here’s a walkthrough in 10 steps (You gullible sod… ed.):

item.title: Branches and breakage
item.description: This was supposed to be the post where I explained how I successfully changed the site theme to Minimal Mistakes. Alas, I made two big mistakes. First, I didn’t read the theme documentation properly. Second, I didn’t test properly before I merged in the changes. So a lot of things broke, and this post was then supposed to detail why. Well, that didn’t happen either.
